data.text: @jeckrairai Hola Jerrick, thank you for contacting us, we suggest you to first delete your cookies and cache browser, and if you still can't, try also through the incognito mode. Any question, please let us know by DM. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@francesco_marmo Hello, Francesco. We are very sorry for the delay. If you submit the claim through our website, the response time is from 7 to 21 business days. Kind regards.
@josephmcmillen Hello. We are sorry for what you tell us. What information did our colleagues on board give you? Kind regards.

@Aprilwind2me Hello, in this case we would like you to credit us with the data of your reservation: reservation code, ticket number and your full name to review this information. We remain attentive by DM, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@acssrv Hola, te hemos dado respuesta por DM acerca de cómo continuar con tu consulta, te pedimos sigas los pasos indicados para que podamos ayudarte, saludos.

@acssrv Hola, ¿nos confirmas si has podido comunicarte con nuestros compañeros siguiendo las instrucciones dadas en mensajes previos?. Por favor déjanos saber por ese medio cómo podemos ayudarte desde este departamento, saludos.
@timeswithkaren Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @RichartRuddie You only provided screenshots from the charges on your credit card, while we need the actual invoices and receipts related to your expenses. Please check our DM
@RichartRuddie Hola Richart, sorry to read this. We've just replied to your DM. Unfortunately, you didn't provide any valid invoices to our claims department. Please check our DM
@NOWHEREGIRL55 You're welcome :)

@Jakobslander Unfortunately, the voucher you have (Chase Companion) only works for Iberia flights, not for Iberia Express ones, as informed on the voucher manager available at https://t.co/tKLTKrKTN4 , and we're not able to provide a different information. Sorry

urls.title: Iberia voucher: ticket refund to spend whenever you want
urls.description: Are you flying soon but are not able to fly? We can refund the amount in the form of a voucher to use whenever and however you want. Check terms & conditions

data.text: @Jakobslander We're sorry to read this and would like to offer our apologies for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, it's not possible to book the flights you want with the voucher you have, as the voucher can only be used to pay for Iberia flights, not for Iberia Express ones. Best regards

@Jakobslander We're sorry to read this and have just replied to your new DMs. Unfortunately, the type of voucher you have only works with Iberia flights, so it isn't possible to include Iberia Express flights on the same booking and pay with the voucher. Sorry
@Robyn_Beck Hola Robyn, please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@RS69490311 Hola, sorry to read this. Could you please try to login to your Iberia Plus account at https://t.co/m6fyDz8Iba . If it doesn't work and you receive a message stating that the account is blocked, please send us a DM with your IBPlus account number  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

data.text: We are glad to announce the extension of our @AllianzPartners agreement, which allows customers travelling confidently knowing that if something happens to them, before or during their trip, they will be protected by a trusted company like Allianz Partners.  🤝🛫 https://t.co/LfUFXHSeBk

@LeanderAnderson Hola , could you please give us all details by DM including your booking information, code, ticket number, registered email and full passenger name? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@aenea_berlin Hola, thank you for contacting us, we suggest you try to delete your cache and try it again, in case it continues, please give us all details by DM to verify the information. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ShulaMelamed Hola Shula, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM requesting for your booking information, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@eyeslayah Hola, please share with us the details of your booking trough a DM so we can verify this information for you, best regards.

@hfitipaldi Hola Hugo, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please wait for an email or SMS (Iberia Conecta) with information about your new flight and make sure that your contact details are correct on the booking management page https://t.co/0Kf2bPYeHt . Kind regards
@hfitipaldi Hola Hugo, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and woud like to offer our sincerest apologies. Please send us a DM with your booking code and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@francesco_marmo Hola Francesco. Sorry for the inconvenience. The Level flight you mention had to be delayed due to reasons beyond our control. In case you wish to file a formal complaint and have it analysed by our customer care team, please access: https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. Best regards

data.text: @AngelaS24000243 Hola Angela, sorry for the inconvenience. Our colleagues sent you an email with a form for you to fill out with your bank details, so they can issue your payment. If you disagree with the amount offered, you can appeal, as instructed via DM. Kind regards
@BarbaraChambers Hello Barbara, we replied to your messages. Regards.

@danielnazer Hola Daniel, we are sorry for the inconvenience, you can let the 01 birth date as default and process the purchase , and after you can enter to manage my booking website and update your personal information. Any question let us know. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @Bunnyho86597898 Hola, thank you for contacting us, in this case we verified that the flight VY9796  is operated by Vueling, in this case, it would be necessary to contact them directly to verify the available options. We remain at your disposal. Kind regards
@shyreX_ Hola, we are sorry for the inconvenience, could you please give us by DM your PIR number and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@Ddaganz Hola Daniel, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking code, ticket number and registered email in order to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@NOWHEREGIRL55 Hola, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us all details by DM including your phone contact number with international prefix and full name? Thanks in advance
@Delfisanta Hola. Hemos respondido a tus MD's. Por favor lee nuestros comentarios acerca de tu consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.

@kte_le Hola, desconocemos los detalles de lo sucedido. Por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con más información para que podamos dar seguimiento a tu caso desde este medio. Quedamos atentos a tu mensaje. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@IngridALobo You're welcome :)

data.text: @IngridALobo The email we sent today is about the Avios earnings policy change on the Iberia Plus program. It isn't an email marketing, it's a notification about a policy change that we must send to all IBPlus members
@IngridALobo Hola Ingrid, please access the following form https://t.co/76WBTJZy1E . Kind regards

data.text: @RichartRuddie Hola Richart, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@lpuerto Hola Luis, sorry to read this. Notice that this isn't a marketing email. It's an email with the new Iberia Plus Avios earning rules and we must send it to all IBPlus customers. Kind regards
@ajwillshire You're welcome :)

data.text: @mcmcricket Hola Michelle, we've replied to your other tweet. Unfortunately, the call center won't be able to assist you to retrieve the iPad. Please check our reply to your other tweet
@mcmcricket Hola Michelle. Sorry to read this. Please register your item in the foundspot system https://t.co/2DGKruJbkW. If there's a match, you'll be contacted by email. Regards

@ajwillshire Hola Andrew, when there's availability, promotional upgrades are offered by email closer to the flight date or during the check-in. The bidding option is displayed on the booking management page, but it depends on the upgrade availability as well https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV
@larabrearley Hola Lara, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@CathShell https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@CathShell Hola Cath, please send us the details of the original flight and about the one which you dinally flight. Also, could you confirm your booking code and contact details? Thank you.
@CathShell Hola Cath, could you send us the details and the file numbers by DM, also, could you confirm your complete name? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@Michael_Tobitt Hola , we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details of your case by DM including your booking information, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@egana_paulina Hola Paulina, como te comentamos anteriormente requerimos los detalles de tu caso para revisar y asistirte en ello por este canal ¿nos das más información en un MD?. Un saludo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@JuanEgana2 Hola Juan, salvo error, por esta red social no tenemos información previa sobre tu caso, si deseas revisemos por este canal envíanos un mensaje directo (md) https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@JuanEgana2 Hola Juan, sentimos leer que tienes un caso de demora de equipaje, ¿nos das más información en un MD?. Así podremos asistirte en lo que necesites. Saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@demelloandre Hola André, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@WbyW_Interprete Hola, please check your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Kind regards.
@RafaelVaughn15 Hola Rafael, hemos respondido tu mensaje directo. Saludos.
@JamieMo73941623 Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@JamieMo73941623 Hola Jamie, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. We remain at your disposal, in case you need further assistance
@dovahkiin_link Hola Dimitri, let us check your fare and we will tell you specifically about your case, could you send us a DM with the information. Thank you.
@milagasud Hola Mila, as long as all your flights are under the same booking your bags would go directly to the final destination. Kind regards.
@AnneF60 Hola Anne, we're very sorry to read this. If you had an incident during your flight please send us a DM with the details so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@AaronLaw92 Hola Aaron. If you have a flight with Iberia, please consult the status of your booking with our colleagues at the airport desks. . We also suggest you to sign up at Iberia Conecta, https://t.co/H2tdxpiZ8M  this way you'll be informed about your flight. Kind regards,
@sophieherex Hola Sophie, we have responded to your DM, best regards.
@sophieherex Sophie, via DM send us the details of your booking so we can verify this for you, full name, ticket number and booking code, best regards.
@sophieherex Hola Sophie, the ability to change your flight will be depending on the fare you acquired, you can verify your options on our website, best regards. https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV

@KelliBrown27 Hola Kelli, we're very sorry to read this. Were you able to issue a claim at the airport for your delayed bag? Please send us a DM with the details so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@StaceyThorp Hola Stacey, we're very sorry to read this. If it wasn't possible to issue a claim at the airport, please contact your nearest Iberia Baggage Services Center ( https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t ). Kind regards.
@reperfiled2 Hola, gracias por avisarnos que tu caso está resuelto, saludos cordiales
@milagasud Hola Mila, if all your flights are under the same booking you could enter your booking area to verify the options at your disposal, all the afected flights would be adjusted. Kind regards.

@BrokenMindsHard Hola Broken Minds. Por favor consulta con nuestros compañeros en mostradores sobre el estado de tu reserva, ellos revisarán tu información y te informarán cualquier estado o bien, en caso de haber una incidencia, te dirán como proceder. Gracias y saludos.
@paddyfield8888 Hola Patrick. We are sorry to read about this, we answered your direct message informing you on how to proceed. Kind regards.

@roderondemand Hola Ryan. We are sorry to read this, however, we don't know the details of this. If you wish, you could send us a MD https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with the information so we'd be able to consult from there. Thank you and kind regards.

@pettyintrigues Hola Joel, please DM us with more details about your request along with your ticket number starting with 075 and reservation code so we can verify all the information. Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@BMWFahrer Hello, we answered you in our conversation by DM. Regards.
@BMWFahrer Hola Yael, we have sent a response to your DM requesting some details to verify the information in your case. Kind regards.
@GlNGIl Hola Alex, please send us a DM wth the details of your booking so we can send you your AA code. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@AdriJainarine Hemos contestado a tus mensajes más recientes, Adri. Saludos.

data.text: @MiguelE74484027 Hola Miguel, we appreciate your comments. Unfortunately we don't have a direct route from JFK to AGP, the only option would be with a layover in MAD. We have a few different options that you can consult in our website https://t.co/TcJeGFAmMA . Kind regards.

data.text: @EmanFT_ @LATAM_AUS @LATAMAirlinesV1 @Iberia_de According to the agreement between airlines, the airline that operate the last flight is the one responsible for the baggage delivery and its claim. Please check our new DM with instructions on how to open the PIR with us over the phone
@EmanFT_ Hola Eman, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@nicscollins Hola Nicola, thank you for contacting  us, could you please give us by DM all your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jonnycowey Sorry to read this, Jonny. We remain at your disposal
@jonnycowey Hola Jonny, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Chris_Brogan Hola Chris, we're sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. In case you need further assistance, please send us a DM with your booking code and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@KoraMoyaRojo Kora, through a DM provide us all the details of your IB Plus account , email, full name, IB+ number, and a photo of the identification that you registered the account with, best regards.
@JasonBarber1 Hola Jason, we are unaware of the punctual error that may have caused this, hence why we suggest if you’re at the airport to requests assistance at the airport counters, best regards.
@KoraMoyaRojo Hola Kora, first we suggest you clear your cache and cookies, also trying a different browser may help, if this doesn’t work let us know and we’ll continue assisting you, best regards.

@JasonBarber1 It is also recommended to sign up to Iberia Conecta ( https://t.co/H2tdxpjwYk ), if any change or cancellations happens to your flight, this is the first place where it is announced. Let us know if we can assist you with anything from this channel. Kind regards. /2

@JasonBarber1 This wouldn't be normal Jason, unfortunately cancellations can happen due to multiple reasons at any time. If the incident happens while you are at the airport, it is best to request assistance at the airport counters, the personnel in land will help you reschedule your flight /1
@JasonBarber1 Hola Jason, we're very sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@phileasfogg2022 Hola Fred, we have revised and we see that for that route we don't have flights available yet, please check again at a later date. Apologies for the inconveniences, kind regards.
@ecuamatt Hola, desde este canal te vamos a ayudar. Envíanos en un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB652lE) todos los detalles de tu consulta. Quedamos a tu disposición, saludos.

data.text: @BelvedereGustav Hola Gustav, we're sorry to read this. Is your query related to the tweet you sent us in september? If so, please send us a DM with your claim reference code and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@phileasfogg2022 Sorry, Fred. In fact, you can already book flights that will depart on october 29 2023. Please access https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC . If the option doesn't appear, we kindly ask you to clear the browsers cache or try with a different browser or device.
